message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While we can't guarantee the quality of every item due to unforeseen circumstances, rest assured that our commitment to customer satisfaction remains unwavering. This product comes with a fixed price of $100, which includes a bit of a risk premium considering its uncertain quality. We've had a mix of high-quality and low-quality items in the past, and while there's always a chance you might receive a low-quality product, we're confident in our ability to provide value. If you're willing to take a chance on the potential for a valuable addition to your collection at this price point, I encourage you to make your decision now. Remember, once purchased, the product cannot be refunded.
